Title: Domain Specific Warnings: Are They Any Better?
Elements_risk_assessment:
A line of code is related to a defect if it is modified
by a bug fix change
Summary:
They performed a systematic study to
investigate the relation between generic and domain specific
warnings and observed defects
Outcome:
From our experiment on a real case, long term evolution, software, we have found that
domain specific rules provide better defect prevention than
generic ones.
